```{r}
trainingdata <- read.csv("C:/Users/Admin/Desktop/trainingdata.txt")
 View(trainingdata)
head(trainingdata)
par(mar=rep(2,4))
plot(trainingdata$amountof.time,trainingdata$batterylife)
library(VIM)
impute_data<-aggr(trainingdata,col=c('yellow','red'),
                  numbers=TRUE,sortVars=TRUE,
                  labels=names(trainingdata),gap=3,
                  ylab=c("Missing Data","Pattern")) 
battery_x <- subset(trainingdata,subset=amountof.time<= 4)
lm_battery<-lm(batterylife~amountof.time,data = battery_x )
summary(lm_battery)

```

```{r}
layout(matrix(c(1,2,3,4),2,2))
plot(lm_battery)
plot(battery_x$amountof.time,battery_x$batterylife)
abline(lm_battery,col="red")
input <-  data.frame("amountof.time"= amountof.time)
output <- ifelse(battery_x$amountof.time<=4,predict(lm_battery,input),8)


```
